languages.text: Whenever the wearer deals {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to at least 2 enemies with one attack, they gain the effect of the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}Assassin{/g}'s Elusive Shadow {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Whenever the wearer deals damage to at least 2 enemies with one attack, they gain the effect of the Assassin's Elusive Shadow ability.

languages.text: 当装备者单次攻击至少对2名敌人造成{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}时，装备者获得{g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}刺客{/g}的诡秘阴影{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}效果{/g}。

traits.locale_text: 当装备者单次攻击至少对2名敌人造成伤害时，装备者获得刺客的诡秘阴影{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}效果{/g}。

languages.text: Нанеся {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урон{/g} хотя бы 2 противникам одной атакой, персонаж получает эффект {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способности{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}ассасина{/g} Неуловимая тень.

traits.locale_text: Нанеся урон хотя бы 2 противникам одной атакой, персонаж получает эффект способности ассасина Неуловимая тень.

languages.text: 1回の攻撃で少なくとも2体の敵に{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を与えるたびに、{g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}アサシン{/g}の影潜み{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}の{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}効果{/g}を獲得する。
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer deals {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to at least 2 enemies with one attack, they gain the {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}effect{/g} of the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}Assassin{/g}'s Elusive Shadow {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 1回の攻撃で少なくとも2体の敵にダメージを与えるたびに、アサシンの影潜み{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}の{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}効果{/g}を獲得する。

languages.text: Cada vez que el portador cause {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} a un mínimo de 2 enemigos con un ataque, obtiene el {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}efecto{/g} de la {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidad{/g} Sombra evasiva de {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}asesino{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Cada vez que el portador cause daño a un mínimo de 2 enemigos con un ataque, obtiene el {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}efecto{/g} de la {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidad{/g} Sombra evasiva de asesino.

languages.text: Immer wenn der Träger {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} bei mindestens 2 Feinden mit einem Angriff verursacht, erhält er den Effekt der {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeit{/g} Flüchtiger Schatten des {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}Assassinen{/g}.
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer deals {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to at least 2 enemies with one attack, they gain the effect of the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}Assassin{/g}'s Elusive Shadow {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Immer wenn der Träger Schaden bei mindestens 2 Feinden mit einem Angriff verursacht, erhält er den {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}Effekt{/g} der {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeit{/g} Flüchtiger Schatten des Assassinen.

languages.text: Chaque fois que l'utilisateur inflige des {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} à au moins 2 ennemis au cours d'une même attaque, il bénéficie de l'{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}effet{/g} de la {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacité{/g}Ombre Insaisissable de l'{g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}Assassin{/g}.
